intro: Tachia gracilis, commonly known as the slender tachia, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Alismataceae. It is characterized by its narrow, grass-like leaves and small, inconspicuous white flowers that appear in clusters. Its growth habit makes it an important component of aquatic ecosystems, supporting various aquatic life forms.
